description.raw:
A few generally helpful lyse functions we have added in our lab to round out functionality. Particularly it adds get\_result\(\) and get\_results\(\) to match the corresponding save\_result\(\) and save\_results\(\) methods already in lyse. 

Also added a more general get\_attrs\(\) function that returns all attributes of a group as a dictionary, which is handy for getting non-result attributes like device configuration options, or even results themselves if a dictionary structure is desired.

Finally, modified the docstrings I just made for the save\_result\(s\) methods to be consistent with these and slightly more accurate.
description.html:
A few generally helpful lyse functions we have added in our lab to round out functionality. Particularly it adds get_result() and get_results() to match the corresponding save_result() and save_results() methods already in lyse.

Also added a more general get_attrs() function that returns all attributes of a group as a dictionary, which is handy for getting non-result attributes like device configuration options, or even results themselves if a dictionary structure is desired.

Finally, modified the docstrings I just made for the save_result(s) methods to be consistent with these and slightly more accurate.

title.raw: Add some logically absent Lyse functions
